content:
Transmission Festival音乐节（也被称为Transmission）是一个大型的室内trance音乐活动，最初在捷克首都布拉格的O2 Arena举行。在2014年3月，音乐节第一次在斯洛伐克的布拉迪斯拉发举办。2016年7月，Transmission Festival第一次离开欧洲，在澳大利亚的墨尔本举行。2017年3月，音乐节进一步扩展，在泰国曼谷进行演出，9月又回到墨尔本。2018年，音乐节回到泰国曼谷，主持为期两天的德国AirBeat One Festival音乐节（靠近Neustadt-Glewe），并在首次亮相上海。2019年3月，音乐节回到澳大利亚悉尼展览场（Sydney Showground）。

 

该音乐节以壮观的激光秀而闻名。马库斯·舒尔茨（Markus Schulz）经常成为世界各地音乐节的头条。
contentEn:
Transmission Festival (also known as Transmission) is a large indoor trance music event originally based in Prague, Czech Republic[1] at the O2 Arena.[2] In March 2014, the festival was held for the first time in Bratislava, Slovakia.[3] Leaving Europe's shores for the first time, in July 2016 the festival was held in Melbourne, Australia.[4] In March 2017 the festival extended further by visiting Bangkok, Thailand[5] and returned to Melbourne, Australia in September. In 2018, the festival returned to Bangkok, Thailand,[6] hosted two days at Germany's AirBeat One Festival[7] near Neustadt-Glewe, and debuted in Shanghai[8] for its first edition in China. In March 2019, the festival returned to Australia to Sydney Showground.

 

It is famous for its spectacular laser show. Markus Schulz frequently headlines the festival around the world.[9]

 

References

  1. ^ Club Night Transmission at o2 Area (The Prague Post)
  2. ^ http://usatrancemovement.com/home/2013/05/29/transmission-10th-edition-o2-arena-prague-czech-republic-november-30th-2013/
  3. ^http://www.festivalphoto.net/reviews&review=3388#.VRi7w0r9rw4
  4. ^ http://www.thetranceproject.com.au/transmission-melbourne-2016-australia/
  5. ^ "TRANSMISSION THAILAND 2017 – FULL LINE-UP AND TRAILER".
  6. ^ "Transmission Bangkok 2018". www.facebook.com. Retrieved 2018-09-06.
  7. ^ "Transmission stage at Airbeat One Festival 2018". www.facebook.com. Retrieved 2018-09-06.
  8. ^ "Transmission Shanghai 2018". www.facebook.com. Retrieved 2018-09-06.
  9. ^ http://www.edmsauce.com/2013/11/18/anco-van-der-kolk-talks-about-pragues-anticipated-transmission/
remarks:

原文译自 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transmission_(festival)
